name: Arsonists Dilemma
description:
In this game you are an arsonist trying to burn down the blue houses but you don't have enough matches.

Each level starts with choosing what places you want to burn first and then you press play in the bottom left to start the fires. A burnt house can be burnt again. The fire follows Connway's game of life:

  • Any fire with fewer than two neighbouring fires goes out
  • Any fire with two or three neighbours stays
  • Any fire with more than three neighbours goes out
  • Any cell with three live neighbouring fires catches fire

I didn't have time to make levels introduce ideas gradually so if you are stuck https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life contains all the patterns you need to beet the game. Full disclosure I have no elegant solution for the last puzzle but I completed it once so it is possible.

I didn't add audio in time so don't worry if you don't hear anything.

Feel free to make any criticisms or suggestions you have (even if it was likely not added due to time as I might not have thought of it).
